translations.ðŸ“° A RSS/Atom Feed reader App for Next:
ðŸ“° A RSS/Atom Feed reader App for Nextcloud

- ðŸ“² Synchronize your feeds with multiple mobile or desktop [clients](https://nextcloud.github.io/news/clients/)
- ðŸ”„ Automatic updates of your news feeds
- ðŸ†“ Free and open source under AGPLv3, no ads or premium functions

**System Cron is currently required for this app to work**

Requirements can be found [here](https://nextcloud.github.io/news/install/#dependencies)

The Changelog is available [here](https://github.com/nextcloud/news/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)

Create a [bug report](https://github.com/nextcloud/news/issues/new/choose)

Create a [feature request](https://github.com/nextcloud/news/discussions/new)

Report a [feed issue](https://github.com/nextcloud/news/discussions/new)
translations.Please check your data/nextcloud.log fil: Please check your data/nextcloud.log file for additional information!
translations.HTTP Basic Auth credentials must be stor: HTTP Basic Auth credentials must be stored unencrypted! Everyone with access to the server or database will be able to access them!
translations.Last job execution ran {relativeTime}. S: Last job execution ran {relativeTime}. Something seems wrong.
translations.Disable this if you use a custom updater: Disable this if you use a custom updater.
translations.Defines the maximum amount of articles t: Defines the maximum amount of articles that can be read per feed which will not be deleted by the cleanup job; if old articles reappear after being read, increase this value; negative values such as -1 will turn this feature off.
translations.Enable this if you also want to delete u: Enable this if you also want to delete unread articles.
translations.How many redirects the feed fetcher shou: How many redirects the feed fetcher should follow.
translations.Maximum number of seconds to wait for an: Maximum number of seconds to wait for an RSS or Atom feed to load; if it takes longer the update will be aborted.
translations.If provided, the URL of this service wil: If provided, the URL of this service will be queried to display the feeds in the explore feed section. To fall back to the built in explore service, leave this input empty.
translations.Interval in seconds in which the feeds w: Interval in seconds in which the feeds will be updated.
translations.Use next update time for feed updates: Use next update time for feed updates
translations.Enable this to use the calculated next u: Enable this to use the calculated next update time for feed updates. Disable to update feeds based solely on the update interval.
Please select an article from the list...
translations.Please select a valid OPML file: Please select a valid OPML file
translations.Are you sure you want to delete?: Are you sure you want to delete?
translations.Time when the feed was last downloaded: Time when the feed was last downloaded
translations.Time when the next feed update will be d: Time when the next feed update will be done
translations.Only if activated in the admin settings,: Only if activated in the admin settings, otherwise the regular update interval is used
translations.Maximum number of articles reached in a: Maximum number of articles reached in a feed update
translations.Number of errors that have occurred sinc: Number of errors that have occurred since the last successful feed update
translations.Title: Title
translations.Star article and jump to next one: Star article and jump to next one
translations.Show article details in compact view: Show article details in compact view
translations.Close article details in compact view: Close article details in compact view
translations.Mark current articles feed/folder as rea: Mark current articles feed/folder as read
translations.Ajax or webcron mode detected! Your feed: Ajax or webcron mode detected! Your feeds will not be updated!
translations.How to set up the operating system cron: How to set up the operating system cron
translations.Install and set up a faster parallel upd: Install and set up a faster parallel updater that uses the News app's update API
